channel.title: Seriously
channel.description: It's weird.I just found a link leading to a runescape wikipedia. Now i'll get flamed and what not.But what i need to know is. How does this obsession with runescape lead to anything later in life,i find my self everyday speaking to people i used to know through runescape one asked "Hey ***** how do get hypercam",I told them,they asked another 5 times.Now how can he turn on his computer.Let alone talk to me. Where does this obsession start? Is it the Geepees? Or has Andrew tapped into our mind. Think about it we all want to "Catch em all" but seriously.How can a virtual game make you so obsessed? I'm going to be editing articles on there so look out for MOPARSCAPE :) articles :) http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Main_Page I know i'm sometimes immature.But runescape people need to grow up and learn. http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Contact%21 :)

item.title: Seriously
item.dc:creator: @pookey71 Pookey71
item.description:
@pookey71 wrote:

It’s weird.I just found a link leading to a runescape wikipedia.
Now i’ll get flamed and what not.But what i need to know is.
How does this obsession with runescape lead to anything later in life,i find my self everyday speaking to people i used to know through runescape one asked “Hey ***** how do get hypercam”,I told them,they asked another 5 times.Now how can he turn on his computer.Let alone talk to me.
Where does this obsession start? Is it the Geepees? Or has Andrew tapped into our mind.
Think about it we all want to “Catch em all” but seriously.How can a virtual game make you so obsessed?
I’m going to be editing articles on there so look out for MOPARSCAPE articles

runescape.fandom.com

RuneScape Wiki

The wiki devoted to RuneScape that anyone can edit. 43,971 articles since 8 April 2005. Recent updates More updates...


I know i’m sometimes immature.But runescape people need to grow up and learn.
http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Contact!
